document_data.caption: A map showing Pride Street in southwest Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Pride Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Pride Street''' was a road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Pride Street was located in the southwest corner of Zhentil Keep in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. The road ran west to east, beginning along [[Nool Street]] in the west and passing east to end at [[Brigand Way]]. Pride Street was intersected by [[Beggars' Way]], [[Dixon Street]] and [[Silver Street]].
document_data.Notable Locations: The [[Tower of Pain Exalted]], a notorious temple to [[Loviatar]], and a [[Zhentarim]] warehouse were both located along Pride Street.
